text: The Citroën Jumpy (Citroën Dispatch in some countries) is a series of vans and passenger vans produced by Citroën in three generations since 1994. It is built in cooperation with Fiat and Peugeot. Fiat and Peugeot made the same vehicle but with different names, The names were Fiat Scudo and Peugeot Expert. == First generation (1994–2006) == Citroën made the first generation Jumpy in June 1994, In 1995 Citroën renamed their model to "'Dispatch'" in some countries. Peugeot made Peugeot Expert in July 1995. In March 2004, the model was improved at the front and back, It had a new grille, new bonnet, new bumper and different headlamps. File:CitroënJumpy30062013.jpg|Citroën Jumpy before improvements File:Peugeot Expert white front.jpg|Peugeot Expert before improvements File:Fiat Scudo front 20080402.jpg|Fiat Scudo before improvements File:1998 Citroen Dispatch Diesel 1.9 Rear.jpg|Citroën Dispatch rear before improvements File:Citroën Jumpy in St Trond.jpg|Citroën Jumpy after improvements File:Patrullapm.jpg|Peugeot Expert after improvements File:Fiat Scudo 2004.JPG|Fiat Scudo after improvements File:2005 Peugeot Expert 900 HDi facelift 2.0 Rear.jpg|Peugeot Expert rear after improvements == Second generation (2007–2016) == The second generation Citroën Junpy/Dispatch was made in November 2006, The Peugeot Expert was made in January 2007. In February 2011, the model was improved at the front and back, It had a new grille, new bonnet, new bumper and different headlamps and brakelights. In July 2013, Toyota made the same vehicle but with a different name, The name was Toyota ProAce. The PSA/Fiat joint venture ended in March 2016, which meant Fiat wouldn't be creating any more Fiat Scudos. September 2012, Wuppertal.jpg|Citroën Jumpy after improvements File:Peugeot Expert (II, Facelift) – Frontansicht, 15. Juli 2012, Ratingen.jpg|Peugeot Expert after improvements File:2014 Toyota Proace 1200 L1H1 HDi 2.0 Front.jpg|Toyota ProAce File:2015 Peugeot Expert 1000 L1H1 Prof-Nal facelift 1.6 Rear.jpg|Peugeot Expert rear after improvements == Third generation (2016–present) == The third generation Citroën Junpy/Dispatch, Peugeot Expert and Toyota Proace vans was made in 2016. The Vauxhall Vivaro and Opel Vivaro was made in 2019. Fiat Scudo was made in 2022. Citroën, Peugeot, Opel, Fiat and Toyota made passenger vans, these are called; Citroën SpaceTourer, Peugeot Traveller, Opel Zafira Life, Fiat Ulysse, and Toyota Proace Verso.
